Question.Subject: What are some places where you can create a Wiki absolutely free?
Question.Content: without having to be a member of an educational institution or studying at one. I just wana create one for an informal group of us studying something. thanks
Question.ChosenAnswer: Take a look at MediaWiki (the software behind Wikipedia) and the requirements for it (mainly PHP, MySQL, and a web server). If you can find a hosting service (or host it on your own server or even a desktop), it is easy to setup.

Answer.Content: Take a look at MediaWiki (the software behind Wikipedia) and the requirements for it (mainly PHP, MySQL, and a web server). If you can find a hosting service (or host it on your own server or even a desktop), it is easy to setup.
